feed.title: Erotica a la carte » The Stories
feed.subtitle: Fantasy erotica, created monthly from listeners' survey

entry.title: Princess Interrupted
entry.summary: Snow is a fairy-tale princess out of her element. Then in a bar that none of her kind should ever enter, she meets a man… or is he a prince? By Michele Bekemeyer Promo Trapping a Duchess Coming in June a story from Terry Mixon
entry.content:
Snow is a fairy-tale princess out of her element. Then in a bar that none of her kind should ever enter, she meets a man… or is he a prince?

By Michele Bekemeyer

Promo

Trapping a Duchess

Coming in June a story from Terry Mixon

entry.title: Dagger of the Mind
entry.summary: Warning- this is horror erotica. The darkness of this story may not be for everyone. The steak is served bloody, so it’s not for children either. Something terrible is in Anna’s mind. Something alien that uses desire as a whip, but is it trying to drive her mad or is something even more nefarious going on? By [...]
entry.content:
Warning- this is horror erotica. The darkness of this story may not be for everyone. The steak is served bloody, so it’s not for children either.

Something terrible is in Anna’s mind. Something alien that uses desire as a whip, but is it trying to drive her mad or is something even more nefarious going on?

By Tee Morris with voicework by Starla Huchton and Philippa Ballantine

Promo: Bird House Rules

Next Michelle Bekemeyer is in the kitchen

entry.title: A Study in Pleasure
entry.summary: A grad student takes on a plum job in a museum- but this requires so much more than taking notes and getting her boss coffee. By Starla Huchton with voicework by Philippa Ballantine and Tee Morris Promo The Dreamer’s Thread Next month PG Holyfield is in the kitchen. Download
entry.content:

entry.title: Tears Such as Angels Weep
entry.summary: A lonely hunter carrying more than his fair share of strange secrets, finds more than he bargained for in the wilderness. By Chris Lester with voice work by Kimi Alexandre Promo Metamor City Podcast Next month Starla Huchton is in the kitchen. Download

entry.title: And to all a good night
entry.summary:
A special dish from the Chef- a tale of space travel, sex and love. A lonely pilot comes back from the dark to find not all presents under the tree have ribbons on them. Music supplied by the delightful and talented Starla Huchton of the Dreamer’s Thread novel. Go support her.
To all the saucy listeners out [...]
entry.content:
A special dish from the Chef- a tale of space travel, sex and love. A lonely pilot comes back from the dark to find not all presents under the tree have ribbons on them.

Music supplied by the delightful and talented Starla Huchton of the Dreamer’s Thread novel. Go support her.

To all the saucy listeners out there; thank you so much for your support, comments and ears this year. 2010 is going to be quite an adventure- and we have a delicous platter of fine writers coming up for the first half the year. I will also be collating past stories for both a high quality CD version and a print version.

But for now, have a Merry Christmas and I will see you in the New Year. May you find one you love and share the joy of intimacy with them over the holidays.

Love

Your Chef

Download

entry.title: Pay the Gatekeeper
entry.summary:
In every town there are people with jobs no one else wants. The Gatekeeper is one of those in Hyde, but Lila finds ways to make it more than a little exciting.
Promos The Gift of Lit The Dreamer’s Thread Download Next month the story will be from the delightful Chris Lester who will be writing Supernatural/Lonely corner of earth/Dominance [...]

entry.title: Loves to the be Loved
entry.summary:
In the hedonistic world of New York in the late 70s, four succubi go looking for the next meal. One of them however finds quite a new taste.

entry.title: The Happy Farm
entry.summary: Rose is different- the aliens mind control doesn’t work on her. She is forced to watch as the Bath’il harvest her fellow humans, but when her sister is taken she must venture into the Factory. Next month Succubi in the City Download
entry.content:
Rose is different- the aliens mind control doesn’t work on her. She is forced to watch as the Bath’il harvest her fellow humans, but when her sister is taken she must venture into the Factory.

Next month Succubi in the City

entry.title: The Thirsty Earth
entry.summary: Under the temple of the earth god, a vampire is chained and used for blood rituals. Yet eventually even the most careful human makes a mistake, and that’s all she needs. entry.title: Buried Alive in the Blues

He will [...]

By J Daniel Sawyer 

Promos

Whole Lot of Nonsense Podcast

Next month the Uber Nemesis of Podcast fiction, Tee Morris. He will be writing an alternative history set in a government agency, with the kinky addition of ‘tie me up, tie me down’. Oh My!

entry.title: A Heart of Hammered Brass
entry.summary:
Olivia’s life of gentile middle-class existence is challenged by a face from her past. Steamy goodness ensues. Promos Steampunk Spectacular Acts of Desperation Next month- Antithesis writer and producer the devilishly talented J D Sawyer takes a turn in the kitchen. He will be in the kitchen sizzling up a delightful dish of female/speak-easy/Mystery. Can you say NOM?

entry.title: Chef’s Special- Puck’s Christmas
entry.content:
No- you’re not seeing things. The chef came in specially over the holidays to give you a little amuse bouche, something she decided all on her own to do. Welcome an old friend back…

If you find it worthy you may wish to donate via the PayPal link- either way… enjoy.

Download

entry.title: Measureless to Man
entry.summary: Yes, itunes has still banned this cast, but you can still subscribe using the following method. Make sure in itunes you are in the podcast tab. Then click in the toolbar on Advanced, click on subscribe to podcast and then paste in this url http://feeds.feedburner.com/EroticaALaCarte So onto this month’s story… An orbiting space station in the middle of a [...]
entry.content:
Yes, itunes has still banned this cast, but you can still subscribe using the following method.

Make sure in itunes you are in the podcast tab. Then click in the toolbar on Advanced, click on subscribe to podcast and then paste in this url

http://feeds.feedburner.com/EroticaALaCarte

So onto this month’s story…

An orbiting space station in the middle of a civil war, with a female main characters- what can happen in 24 hours?

Welcome to Kubali Station…

Featuring the voice talents of Tee Morris, writer, podcaster and alien extrodinaire

Promo

Being Healthy for Busy People

The BoobCast

 

Download

 Next month Dark Age Britain/Three’s Company/ 1st person POV/Horny and bored
